t:
With only a few million
people left in the world,
we launched the satellite
carrying the history and
culture of our doomed planet.


If any alien race ever shows any interest on the third planet in this solar system, they need to know how we became the cause of our own destruction.
c:
Let's save the planet, just a little. Also, save yourself, stay in, wear mask if going out.



#earth #destruction #satellite #save #rediscover #awareness
#earthday #saveearth





Unlike me, remember to save the Earth everyday; not just on this day.
